name: Import PowerShell Modules From Suspicious Directories
description: Detects powershell scripts that import modules from suspicious directories
query: powershell.file.script_block_text:(/.*[Ii][Mm][Pp][Oo][Rr][Tt]\-[Mm][Oo][Dd][Uu][Ll][Ee]\ \"$[Ee][Nn][Vv]\:[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*[Ii][Mm][Pp][Oo][Rr][Tt]\-[Mm][Oo][Dd][Uu][Ll][Ee]\ '$[Ee][Nn][Vv]\:[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*[Ii][Mm][Pp][Oo][Rr][Tt]\-[Mm][Oo][Dd][Uu][Ll][Ee]\ $[Ee][Nn][Vv]\:[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*[Ii][Mm][Pp][Oo][Rr][Tt]\-[Mm][Oo][Dd][Uu][Ll][Ee]\ \"$[Ee][Nn][Vv]\:[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\.*/ OR /.*[Ii][Mm][Pp][Oo][Rr][Tt]\-[Mm][Oo][Dd][Uu][Ll][Ee]\ '$[Ee][Nn][Vv]\:[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\.*/ OR /.*[Ii][Mm][Pp][Oo][Rr][Tt]\-[Mm][Oo][Dd][Uu][Ll][Ee]\ $[Ee][Nn][Vv]\:[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\.*/ OR /.*[Ii][Mm][Pp][Oo][Rr][Tt]\-[Mm][Oo][Dd][Uu][Ll][Ee]\ [Cc]\:\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\[Pp][Uu][Bb][Ll][Ii][Cc]\\.*/ OR /.*[Ii][Pp][Mm][Oo]\ \"$[Ee][Nn][Vv]\:[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*[Ii][Pp][Mm][Oo]\ '$[Ee][Nn][Vv]\:[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*[Ii][Pp][Mm][Oo]\ $[Ee][Nn][Vv]\:[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*[Ii][Pp][Mm][Oo]\ \"$[Ee][Nn][Vv]\:[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\.*/ OR /.*[Ii][Pp][Mm][Oo]\ '$[Ee][Nn][Vv]\:[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\.*/ OR /.*[Ii][Pp][Mm][Oo]\ $[Ee][Nn][Vv]\:[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\.*/ OR /.*[Ii][Pp][Mm][Oo]\ [Cc]\:\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\[Pp][Uu][Bb][Ll][Ii][Cc]\\.*/)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`powershell.file.script_block_text:(*Import\-Module\ \"$Env\:Temp\\* OR *Import\-Module\ '$Env\:Temp\\* OR *Import\-Module\ $Env\:Temp\\* OR *Import\-Module\ \"$Env\:Appdata\\* OR *Import\-Module\ '$Env\:Appdata\\* OR *Import\-Module\ $Env\:Appdata\\* OR *Import\-Module\ C\:\\Users\\Public\\* OR *ipmo\ \"$Env\:Temp\\* OR *ipmo\ '$Env\:Temp\\* OR *ipmo\ $Env\:Temp\\* OR *ipmo\ \"$Env\:Appdata\\* OR *ipmo\ '$Env\:Appdata\\* OR *ipmo\ $Env\:Appdata\\* OR *ipmo\ C\:\\Users\\Public\\*)`
